data.name: Sable's Grimoire Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
31 original music tracks by composer Mario Luengo, commissioned for Sable's Grimoire.
The tracks are all high quality WAV files.

Track list:
01 Sable's Grimoire.wav
02 The Big City.wav
03 Amadronia Academy.wav
04 Cafeteria.wav
05 Courtyard.wav
06 Hallway.wav
07 Dorm Room.wav
08 Classroom.wav
09 Library.wav
10 Spellcasting.wav
11 Remorse.wav
12 Infirmary.wav
13 Danger.wav
14 Is This Love.wav
15 Night On Campus.wav
16 The Principal's Office.wav
17 Tension.wav
18 Underground Facilities.wav
19 The World Of Succubi.wav
20 The Hunt.wav
21 Date In The City.wav
22 Tranquil Forest.wav
23 Elven Forest.wav
24 Elven Village.wav
25 Ein's Home.wav
26 Strategy Meeting.wav
27 Bartholomew's Village.wav
28 Flying High.wav
29 Bad End.wav
30 Happy Days Ahead.wav
31 Good End.wav

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 950 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires python to be installed for Steam launcher to work

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.4
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 950 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires python to be installed for Steam launcher to work

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 950 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires python to be installed for Steam launcher to work
